aston.nabneyit.util

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • aston.nabneyit.util.Unit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Machine, Sink, Source

    public abstract class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the abstract base class for the processing units in a Factory.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ian T. Nabney

      Unit()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean acceptsInput()
      Checks whether this unit accepts input from other units.
      void connectInput(Connector c)
      Connects the specified Connector as an input to this unit.
      void connectOutput(Connector c)
      Connects the specified Connector as an output from this unit.
      abstract void inputProduct(Product p)
      Takes in a food item for processing.
      int numEntered()
      Returns the number of items that this unit has accepted.
      int numProcessed()
      Returns the number of items that this unit has processed.
      int numSpoiled()
      Returns the number of items that have spoiled in this unit.
      abstract int queueLength()
      Returns the number of food items waiting in this unit.
      abstract void tick()
      Runs this unit for a single simulated time step
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this unit.
